name: Surendra Vikram Singh
heading: About
about: A self-taught UI/UX designer & developer with vast experience in designing and developing user-friendly, performance optimized & mobile friendly web applications with pixel-perfect integration. I'm looking for a company that believes that web technologies are the future & works on Cutting-edge technologies & focused on quality, where I can develop and implement my knowledge

description.name: Nearbuy.com
description.summary: Lead a team of UI developer to develop a CSS framework which powers data-heavy merchant dashboard & administrator tools. Single-handedly designed the progressive mobile web app in the browser. Worked closely with Product managers to conceptualize nearbuy.com as a discovery platform where I played the role of a UX designer and helped in refining the user journey in PRD and converting the idea to a high fidelity wireframes.

description.name: Synechron technologies
description.summary: Developed complex, cross-browser compatible and responsive websites using SASS, Grunt and custom Boilerplate for code maintenance and seamless workflow. Worked on projects like Alcatel-lucent, SABMiller, Sainsbury, NATS, UAE PMO, MSL Group UK & 24/7 Real Media

description.name: Fabulloso
description.summary: Designed, developed and implemented themes for Magento & Wordpress. Keeping user-centric designs in mind developed interactive features & easy to use interfaces using the latest web technologies and various UX techniques. Optimized the code for better performance and cross-browser compatibilities. Websites showcased by ELLE & The Hindu.

description.name: Knowlarity Communication
description.summary: Responsible for front-end design & development of complex web based applications in coordination with developers. Developed templates using the latest technologies (HTML5, CSS3 & jQuery). Designed Android User interface for one of the major Government projects.

description.name: Digisoft
description.summary: Worked independently on designing and developing static websites. Worked with clients like Jaypee Cement, Flex Foods & many more reputed companies. Also worked on Joomla template customization & Search Engine Optimization.
